column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The wait was expected to be half an hour and usually the small pizza is cut up into four pieces but since we were three people
column2: they asked if we wanted it cut into six pieces instead. I didn't have much expectations for deep dish pizza. I had expected it to be similar to lasagna instead of pizza but I was wrong. The thickness was only about an inch deep and it came in its own personal pan but our server helped served each piece on our plate.
